oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Second and third chapters of the anonymous Hindustani work entitled "Nasabh:nāme:hazarat:nabhī:mahamadh:mûstafā" and various accounts.
Foreign paper, two watermarks: "Superein 1896" and "Made in Belgium for Nuzzerally Heptoolabhoy, Bombay".
Written in black ink, 13 lines per page.
Multiple sections stab-sewn, covers missing. First two folios detached, some folios slightly stained.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ismaili literature
Indic literature
South Asian literature
